Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool

Class RightPanelMapCreator

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.RightPanelMapCreator
public class RightPanelMapCreator
extends java.lang.Object
VBox showing ListView of objects that can be added to map within the MapCreator window. Objects are sorted into 11 different tabs, after selecting a tab, contents are displayed in the ListView below.

  • Method Details

    • addDisplayObjectButtonEvent

      public static void addDisplayObjectButtonEvent​(javafx.scene.control.Button button, javafx.collections.ObservableList objects, javafx.scene.control.ListView objectsList)
      Add mouse click event to given button. On click given ListView is set by given ObservableList
      Parameters:
      button - Button to which will be the event added.
      objects - ObservableList which will be added to ListView
      objectsList - ListView whose items will be set
